title: Rotate device needs to reload apps
body: When device is rotated apps are reloaded

title: Improve F-Droid listing
body:
I've seen this app on F-Droid, but it lacks screenshots, changelog and a translatable description there. It's pretty easy for you to add these information. Please have a look at [this example](https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android) or at the [F-Droid docs](https://f-droid.org/en/docs/All_About_Descriptions_Graphics_and_Screenshots/#in-the-apps-source-repository) or [fastlane docs](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots).
After you have commited these files to your repo and tagged a new version, you need to remove the `Description` and `Summary` from the metadata file in the [F-Droid Data repo](https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroiddata).

title: RootTools no activity found to handle intent
Continue the developing of the F-Droid version
Update with Material Design elements
body:
I've add material Toolbar, AlertDialog, and Dialog. I have kept the original dark theme.

However as a consequence of this, ive had to bump the minimum SDK version from _4_ to _7_.

**Images:** http://imgur.com/a/GFQHJ

title: Question: Lolipop support
body:
Is full Lollipop support planned?
Currently. one cannot move system apps in Lollipop.

title: Checkbox for "Show user apps"
body:
In your app one can click a checkbox to see also system apps.

However when one is looking for _only_ system apps, it is not possible to blend out user apps.

Therefore I suggest to implement another checkbox for "Show user apps". Then each of these option can be toggled independently of each other. So it leads to three views:
- only user apps
- user and system apps
- only system apps

Thanks!

title: 4.4.4 problems?
body: Doesn't work in 4.4.4? ...can't move any APP Form sytem to normal.

title: Feature Request: Take apps to be moved from a (user-)supplied list
body:
Your app sounds promising, thanks for making this available. I would welcome if it would offer the possibility to move apps according to a list of apps to be moved which is a typical use case for "debloating" a Stock ROM.

As a further enhancement, the app could supply such lists already for some common ROMs/Devices and (as an even further enhancement) try to auto-detect the device being used to apply a matching debloating list.

title: Icon
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: I really like this app and it seems to need an icon so IÂ´m working on something.

title: Misbehavior after system update
body:
I use Omnirom with nightly updates.
After an system update all apps I had moved from system to normal app are again system apps and all Apps I made system app are lost.
I think this isn't only a problem on custom ROMs but on all androids. And I think this problem can't be solved...

title: Error
label: [Label(name="bug"), Label(name="duplicate")]
body: Often there is an error: can't move the app or something like that and then the app is uninstalled.

title: F-Droid App is broken
body: As it is descripted in the issue #1 the app from F-Droid is broken, but if you compile the app yourself with the sourcecode from github, it works. Please update the F-Droid App.
